issue.title: [Python] Document CSV reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3405](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3405). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should document the Python CSV reader, or at least auto-document the various classes and functions.

Perhaps we should first wait for the API to stabilize.

comments.body:
